# Source data

WormBase is updated on a bi-monthly [release schedule](http://www.wormbase.org/about/release_schedule). If you notice that the source data here is outdated, file an update request as a [GitHub issue](https://github.com/steinbaugh/worminfo/issues).

```{r}
head(geneSource)
```

## More Examples

You can write math expressions, e.g. $Y = X\beta + \epsilon$, footnotes^[A footnote here.], and tables, e.g. using `knitr::kable()`.

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
knitr::kable(head(geneSource, 10))
```
